title: There\'s a legend that shortly after the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge opened in 1969, a Cadillac went speeding off the opened span and into the river. Is this just an urban legend, or is there any truth to it?
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



(P.S. It was in 1977, not 1969.)
